name: STAR RAPTOR
description:
MISSION:

Destroy all enemy fighters, ships and bases. (except stage 6 and 7)

Your fighter, SRF22A, is armed with normal laser and guided missile.

To destroy huge objective like ship or base, eliminate all of shield generators (red-light-blinking hemisphere object) on it. 

Your shield decreases by suffering damage and recovers gradually by consuming energy. 

Thrusting, firing lasers and missiles also consume energy.

You are destroyed if :

  • suffered much damage when the shield is low
  • energy runs out
  • mission time runs out

Losing much energy,  you can refuel on the booster ship once in each stage.

After you accomplished the mission, dock with the booster ship to refuel and proceed to the next stage.

CONTROLS :

See the 'CONTROL INSTRUCTIONS' on the right (strongly recommended to use gamepad)

You can configure controls on the dialogue box which appears when you run the game.
